seo.title: TinaCMS developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a TinaCMS Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a TinaCMS certified developer!

features.headline: TinaCMS developer certifications
features.text: We encourage all developers to earn a badge by demonstrating their knowledge and ability to answer questions and solve problems for their team. As a reward, each developer will, upon successful completion, receive 1 month of TinaCloud Teams Plus (valued at $49) for free.

questions.question: Step 1
questions.answer:
Join Tina's Discord channel - Leave a message on the 'introductions' channel:

* Hi, I am trying out TinaCMS with NextJS, Astro, etc. to build a blog, portfolio, documentation site, etc.
* Previous CMSs I have used include...

questions.question: Step 2
questions.answer:
Get TinaCMS running and deploy a site using a starter template and [TinaCloud.](https://app.tina.io/signin)

* This can be a personal site or one youâ€™ve built for work
* Tip: Check out the TinaCMS editor best practices

questions.question: Step 3
questions.answer:
Send an email to [badge@tina.io](mailto\:badge@tina.io). Answer these questions with supporting screenshots:

* What is your Client ID in TinaCloud?
* On your site, how does the pull request workflow work?
* How do you configure branch previews?
* Scenario: A user uses TinaCMS to make a content change. GitHub says that the commit was made by tina-cloud-bot instead of the user. How do you fix this so the user gets credit for their commits?
* Scenario: You open the editor and see the below error. What steps would you take to resolve it?

![](/schema-mismatch.jpg)Figure: GraphQL Schema Mismatch error

questions.question: Step 4
questions.answer: We will review your email and if successful, you will receive a badge from [Credly](https://info.credly.com/).

questions.question: That's it! You will receive your free TinaCloud coupon via email.
zzStep 5
questions.answer: Accept and share the badge on LinkedIn. Send us another email with a link to your LinkedIn.

questions.question: zzStep 5
questions.answer: Post the video to YouTube (or another video platform) - make sure that it is public.

questions.question: zzStep 6
questions.answer: Optional - Post your video on social media (e.g., LinkedIn, Discord, X...).

questions.question: zzStep 7
questions.answer:
Email us at [badge@tina.io](mailto\:badge@tina.io). Include links to:

* Your video
* Your social media posts (if applicable)
